Welcome to mbpy's documentation by mbodiai!
==========================================

Introduction
============

mbpy is a tool to manage Python projects with ease. This documentation provides an overview of its features and usage.

Installation
============

To install mbpy, follow these steps:

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install mbpy

Usage
=====

Here is an example of how to use mbpy:

.. code-block:: python

   import mbpy

   # Your code here

========
